caption.p: Epidemiological link of all 23 individuals, Large grey background indicates cases within King Khaled University hospital while smaller grey background indicates Prince Mohamed Hospital (PMAH): HCW: Health care worker, CT: Cycle threshold, ICU: Intensive care unit, ER: emergency room.

Epidemiological link of all 23 individuals, Large grey background indicates cases within King Khaled University hospital while smaller grey background indicates Prince Mohamed Hospital (PMAH): HCW: Health care worker, CT: Cycle threshold, ICU: Intensive care unit, ER: emergency room.
Dotted lines indicate possible epidemiological link, solid line indicates confirmed epidemiological link.
